Text.val: 09.11.2010 SH SCR15966 Added pi.CallingProgram and extended DEBC selection
always commercial owner 1 = pi debh or commercial owner 2 = pi.debh
19.04.2004 JJ SCR6037 changed handling of ownership
Program will provide the sum of any DEBB amount field DEBB_ACTINVAxy
for a DEBH (or the DEBH's legally or commercially owned by pi.DEBH)
In either Client or Heller valuta
y is the (blindly) appended pi.ValutaType (C or H)
Note that this program is intended for totals of one field in one currency
if multiple fields or both currencies are needed build a separate
program/task rather than repeated calls to this program
Ownership L or C check debtor

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVA:1) as decimal (13,2)) from :2/DEBB, :2/DEBC :3 where DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO :4 :5 :6 and :7 :8 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: Always for double commercial ownership all debtors commercially owned by one
No owner defined on the selected level => select the next lower
